_metadata.description: Jurisdiction classification and regulatory flag mapping

GDPR_ADEQUATE.description: EU Commission adequacy decision in place
GDPR_ADEQUATE.impact: Data transfer permitted under adequacy framework

GDPR_NOT_ADEQUATE.description: No adequacy decision — requires SCCs or binding corporate rules
GDPR_NOT_ADEQUATE.impact: Additional safeguards required for data transfer

ITAR_RESTRICTED.description: ITAR-restricted country — controlled technical data may not be shared
ITAR_RESTRICTED.impact: Controlled data must not be processed or stored in these jurisdictions

DATA_SOVEREIGNTY.impact: Data may be required to remain in-country
